ygData.subject: Re: Magic Footwear.
ygData.msgSnippet: Although if you want some nice boots, kobald hide boots are AC5, +3 AG, +10 HP.  That s what I m looking for right now, but I can t seem to find any.  I hear
ygData.messageBody:
Although if you want some nice boots, kobald hide boots are AC5, +3 AG, +10
HP. That's what I'm looking for right now, but I can't seem to find any. I
hear they are in upper Guk.
>
> Chris,
>
> You kicks are already magical.
>
> Keote.
>
>
> >
> >
> > Sice we are talking Magic Gloves are there any magic footwear that will
> > allow our kicks to hit magic only creatures? I have a full set of netted
> but
> > Have not been able to get shoes and no one I have talked to knows of
> netted,
> > woven or mesh footwear...
